seo.title: Moon Landing - Filecoin
seo.description: Protocol Labs' accelerator program to onboard storage providers to the ecosystem.

block.heading: Program Overview
block.description:
> Moon Landing is an acceleration program from [Protocol Labs](https://protocol.ai/) designed to onramp storage providers with real data. By participating in Moon Landing, storage providers will store public datasets that are valuable to the world.
>
> To participate, you can elect to participate in [Slingshot](https://slingshot.filecoin.io/), [Evergreen](https://evergreen.filecoin.io/), or both.

block.heading: Storage Provider Benefits
block.description:
> Be a founding member of a new storage provider community

> Connect with fellow storage providers through protocol labs

> Earn and increase your block rewards via Quality Adjusted Power

## Program Timeline


**Month 1**

* Learn about Moon Landing
* Get to know your capsule mates

**Month 2**

* Start the process of sealing real data

**Month 3**

* Complete sealing of your 1st 10 TiB of real data with Moon Landing

**Month 4**

* Seal more real data with Evergreen and/or Slingshot, aiming for 10 TiB / monthÂ 
* Complete sealing your 1st replica from another SP in your country / continent
* 20 TiB data milestone

**Month 5**

* Complete sealing another replica from another SP in a different country / continent
* 30 TiB data milestone

**Month 6**

* 40 TiB milestone

**Month 7**

* End of the Moon Landing program - congratulations graduates!!!
